tool_description: Realtime informations about fuel prices and gas stations in Italy
name: Fuel Prices - Gas Stations - Italy
title: Fuel Prices - Gas Stations - Italy

api_list.name: Search by Geohash
api_list.description:
Search all the Gas Stations and Fuel Prices by providing a gehash instead of Lat/Lng/Radius
For info: [Wikipedia - Geohash](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Geohash)

api_list.name: Search by Latitude/Longitude
api_list.description: Define a location with Latitude and Longitude and a Radius to search within. You can limit the maximum numbers of results.
